---
title: "RBI_CHEMO_analysis"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)

RBI_CHEMO_data<-read_csv("./RBI_CHEMO_data")
  


ggplot(RBI_CHEMO_data, aes(x=RBI_value_ind_noncatch, y=linregs.new))+
  geom_point()+
  #scale_x_log10()+
  geom_smooth(method="lm")

ggplot(RBI_CHEMO_data, aes(x=RBI_value_ind_noncatch, y=linregs.abs.new))+
  geom_point()+
  scale_x_log10()+
  #scale_y_log10()+
  geom_smooth(method="lm", se=FALSE)

 

RBI_ind_noncatch_lm<-lm(linregs.new~RBI_value_ind_noncatch, RBI_CHEMO_data)

RBI_ind_noncatch_abs_lm<-lm(linregs.abs.new~RBI_value_ind_noncatch, RBI_CHEMO_data)

summary(RBI_ind_noncatch_lm)
summary(RBI_ind_noncatch_abs_lm)
```
